header_text: You arrive to a support group meeting with your mask on. You notice that all of your peers are not wearing a mask. You think that they must be well.

elements.Text: Are any of the support group members sick?

elements.name: You arrive to a support group meeting with your mask on. You notice that all of your peers are not wearing a mask. You think that they must be well. _Physical Health_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
